articles.description: Children have lower levels of an enzyme/co-receptor that SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes Covid-19
articles.content:

articles.title: Polio: First ever vaccine listed under WHO emergency use - indiablooms
articles.description: Geneva: WHO on Friday listed the nOPV2 vaccine (Bio Farma, Indonesia) for emergency use to address the rising cases of a vaccine-derived polio strain in a number of African and East Mediterranean countries.
